result.explanation: There is no node ‘md:Extensions/mdattr:EntityAttributes/saml:Attribute[@Name='http://macedir.org/entity-category' and @NameFormat='urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:uri']/saml:AttributeValue/text()’, or no such node has the value 'http://refeds.org/category/research-and-scholarship'.
result.requirement: Completely a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.

result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘Digital Repository for the CLARIN Research Infrastructure provided by ILC-CNR’) length (= 77) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘ILC-CNR for CLARIN-IT Consortium: Digital repository and services on language research infrastructure’) length (= 101) < 20 or > 100.
result.requirement: Partially a requirement for DFN-AAI registration. Partially a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.
